trans-unit.source: You should not implement this interface, as it is used only by the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop> class internally to represent the unmanaged version of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Você não deve implementar essa interface, pois ele é usado somente pelo <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop>classe internamente para representar a versão não gerenciada do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction>interface do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices>namespace.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop>

trans-unit.source: You should not implement any method of this interface, as it is used only by the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop> class internally to represent the unmanaged version of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Você não deve implementar qualquer método desta interface, pois ele é usado somente pelo <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop>classe internamente para representar a versão não gerenciada do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction>interface do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices>namespace.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop>

trans-unit.source: An optional <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.BOID"></xref> that indicates why the transaction is being aborted.
trans-unit.target: Um recurso opcional <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.BOID"> </xref> que indica o motivo pelo qual a transação está sendo anulada.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, indicating that no reason for the abort is provided.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, indicando que nenhum motivo para a anulação é fornecido.

trans-unit.source: This value must be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor deve ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When `async` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, an asynchronous abort is performed and the caller must use <xref uid="langword_csharp_ITransactionOutcomeEvents" name="ITransactionOutcomeEvents" href=""></xref> to learn about the outcome of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Quando `async` é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, uma operação de anulação assíncrona é executada e o chamador deve usar <xref uid="langword_csharp_ITransactionOutcomeEvents" name="ITransactionOutcomeEvents" href=""> </xref> para saber mais sobre o resultado da transação.

trans-unit.source: For values of `commitType`, see `ITransaction::Commit` in the OLE DB Programmers Reference.
trans-unit.target: Para obter valores de `commitType`, consulte `ITransaction::Commit` na OLE DB programadores de referência.

trans-unit.source: You should not implement any method of this interface, as it is used only by the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop> class internally to represent the unmanaged version of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Você não deve implementar qualquer método desta interface, pois ele é usado somente pelo <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop>classe internamente para representar a versão não gerenciada do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction>interface do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices>namespace.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop>

trans-unit.source: This value must be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor deve ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value taken from the OLE DB enumeration <xref uid="langword_csharp_XACTTC" name="XACTTC" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor obtido da enumeração OLE DB <xref uid="langword_csharp_XACTTC" name="XACTTC" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You should not implement any method of this interface, as it is used only by the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop> class internally to represent the unmanaged version of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Você não deve implementar qualquer método desta interface, pois ele é usado somente pelo <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop>classe internamente para representar a versão não gerenciada do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction>interface do <xref:System.EnterpriseServices>namespace.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> </xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop>

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the caller-allocated <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.XACTTRANSINFO"></xref> structure that will receive information about the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Ponteiro para o chamador alocada <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.XACTTRANSINFO"> </xref> estrutura que receberá informações sobre a transação.

trans-unit.source: This value must not be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor não deve ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
